english.segment1: Precious cornerstone, sure foundation. You are faithful to the end. We are waiting, on You, Jesus. We believe You're all to us
english.segment2: Let the glory of Your name be the passion of the Church. Let the righteousness of God be a holy flame that burns. Let the saving love of Christ be the measure of our lives. We believe You're all to us
english.segment3: Only Son of God sent from Heaven. Hope and mercy at the cross. You are everything, You're the Promise. Jesus, You are all to us
english.segment4: You're all to us. You're all to us. You're all to us. Yes, You are
english.segment5: When this passing world is over. We will see You face to face. And forever we will worship. Jesus, You are all to us.
